transcription: Hey, it's Nicole from the Mixed Morning Show. If you read Mike's blog about Idaho's favorite Halloween candy and it being candy corn, you may not agree with that. But I wanted to find out what kids here in the Treasure Valley are looking forward to for Halloween candy in their trick-or-treat baskets this year. My favorite Halloween candy is a Kit Kat. What is your favorite candy? What kind of candy do you like? M&Ms. You like M&Ms? I like M&Ms!  My favorite Halloween candy is Reese's and I also like to get Smarties. My favorite Halloween candy is the candy corn pumpkins but I also like to get Skittles and Smarties. Levi, what's your favorite Halloween candy? I don't know. That's a hard question. Well, what do you hope to get in your bag this year? Spongebob candy! Woohoo!  you
